nodes.text: Darlo was a star located in the Dagobah system of the Outer Rim Territories Sluis sector. It was located 50,250 light-years from the Core in M-19 on the Standard Galactic Grid. The planet Dagobah filled its second orbital position.

In the new Star Wars canon, Darlo was mentioned in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 20.. The star originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2006 video game guide Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption Expansion: Prima Official Game Guide, which was written by Michael Knight.
